mapper.select: select x.order_id as orderId, x.order_no as orderNo, p.pd_name as pdName, p.pd_price as pdPrice, x.order_price as orderPrice, x.express_no as expressNo, x.create_time as createTime from (select i.order_id,i.order_no,i.user_id,i.order_price,i.express_no,i.create_time,j.pd_id from j_order i left join j_ordexx j on i.order_id=j.order_id where user_id=#{userId}) x left join product p on x.pd_id=p.pd_id

select x.order_status as orderStatus, x.order_no as orderNo, p.pd_name as pdName, p.pd_price as pdPrice, x.order_price as orderPrice, x.create_time as createTime from (select i.order_status,i.order_no,i.user_id,i.order_price,i.create_time,j.pd_id from j_order i left join j_ordexx j on i.order_id=j.order_id where user_id=#{userId} and order_status=#{orderStatus}) x left join product p on x.pd_id=p.pd_id
select order_no as orderNo, user_id as userId, order_price as orderPrice, express_no as expressNo, create_time as createTime, order_status as orderStatus from j_order where order_id=#{orderId}
